LanguageData.AchtungEnabledExplained: This mod can be turned on/off without restarting RimWorld
LanguageData.AltKeyInvertedExplained1: Pressing Alt-key shows menu instead of positioning colonists
LanguageData.AltKeyInvertedExplained2: Pressing Alt-key positions colonists instead of showing the menu
LanguageData.ModDeactivated: The mod is disabled. To enable it, go to {0} and turn it on again.
